    • addIpfIOInput

      public void addIpfIOInput(Product p, de.dlr.proseo.model.joborder.Proc proc, JobStep jobStep, Boolean useTimeintervals)
      Add input file definition of product p recursively.
      Parameters:
      p - Product
      proc - The Ipf_Proc
      jobStep - Job step
      useTimeIntervals - if true, generates TimeInterval elements to the input definition

    • addIpfIOInput

      public void addIpfIOInput(Map<String,List<Product>> productClasses, de.dlr.proseo.model.joborder.Proc proc, JobStep jobStep, Boolean useTimeintervals)
      Add input file definition of products recursively.
      Parameters:
      productClasses - a map of products accessible by product class
      proc - the Ipf_Proc element to add the input to
      jobStep - the job step, for which the Job Order is generated
      useTimeIntervals - if true, generates TimeInterval elements to the input definition

    • addIpfIOOutput

      Add output file definition of product p recursively.
      Parameters:
      p - Product
      proc - The Ipf_Proc
      jobStep - Job step
      baseDir - Base directory path of output data in facility/storage manager

    • sendJobOrderToStorageManager

      Send the job order as Base64 string to storage manager
      Parameters:
      kubeConfig - The processing facility used
      jobOrder - The job order file
      jobOrderVersion - the Job Order file specification version to apply
      Returns:
